label.value: QNONREG - Questionnaire tests KW (YCpairwise) et accessibilité

description.value: "Ceci est une déclaration de type aide CAWI, associée au titre de séquence. Elle doit s'inscrire en description."

"Aide Cawi qui doit se mettre en description It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like)."

label.value: "1\. " || "Je suis le libellé de la question de type texte de longueur 9 donc inférieure à 250 caractères"

"Aide CAWI après le libellé avec 
un saut de ligne
*de l'italique*
**du gras**
- un tiret
- un autre"

control.value: not(not(isnull(DATE)) and (cast(DATE, date, "YYYY-MM-DD")<cast("2000-01-01", date, "YYYY-MM-DD") or cast(DATE, date, "YYYY-MM-DD")>cast("2020-03-31", date, "YYYY-MM-DD")))
